title: Pool, Covered Parking, Patio/Balcony
posting_body: Welcome to Sunset Cove ApartmentsSunset Cove is located just off of East Charleston Blvd and East Nellis Blvd in Las Vegas, Nevada.
Thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, our two and three bedroom floor plans feature a wide array of stylishly efficient amenities.

Imagine your new apartment hosting a fully-equipped kitchen with dishwasher and pantry, a breakfast bar, ceiling fans, a skylight, fireplace, vaulted ceilings, spacious closets, air conditioning, in-home washers and dryers, and a balcony or patio.
At Sunset Cove we offer residents everything they need for an effortless and unparalleled lifestyle.
We are pet-friendly, so bring your furry friend along to join the fun.
Sunset Cove Apartments is a gated access community with ample guest parking and professional management that is here to quickly help you when you need it.
Tour our property and see why this is the ideal place to call home.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
